verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> on Neginoth, <S%H5058><s%> Maschil, <S%H4905><s%> A Psalm of David, <S%H1732><s%> when the Ziphims <S%H2130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> Doth not David <S%H1732><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> himself with us? Save <S%H3467><s%> me, O God, <S%H430><s%> by your name, <S%H8034><s%> and judge <S%H1777><s%> me by your strength. <S%H1369><s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> give ear <S%H238><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

For strangers <S%H2114><s%> are risen <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> me, and oppressors <S%H6184><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul: <S%H5315><s%> they have not set <S%H7760><s%> God <S%H430><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> them. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is my helper: <S%H5826><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> is with them that uphold <S%H5564><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
He shall reward <S%H7725><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> to my enemies: <S%H8324><s%> cut <S%H6789><s%> them off in your truth. <S%H571><s%>
I will freely <S%H5071><s%> sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to you: I will praise <S%H3034><s%> your name, <S%H8034><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for it is good. <S%H2896><s%>
For he has delivered <S%H5337><s%> me out of all <S%H3605><s%> trouble: <S%H6869><s%> and my eye <S%H5869><s%> has seen <S%H7200><s%> his desire on my enemies. <S%H341><s%>
